tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE signature_mismatches (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    signature VARCHAR(255),
    mismatch_count INT,
    flagged BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE flagged_activities (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    activity_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    flagged BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE signature_mismatches (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    mismatch_count INT,
    flagged BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE fraudulent_activities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE flagged_activities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_id INT,
    flag_reason VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE signatures (
    signature_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    signature_blob BLOB,
    mismatch_count INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    account_balance DECIMAL(10,2),
    creation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE flagging (
    flag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    flag_type VARCHAR(20),
    flag_reason TEXT,
    flagged_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE fraud (
    fraud_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    fraud_type VARCHAR(30),
    fraud_level INT,
    fraud_details TEXT
)
